articles.title: Biden: Americans are 'really, really down' over pandemic, gas prices - USA TODAY
articles.description: Biden said in an Associated Press interview that a recession is not inevitable and there's "zero evidence" his policies drove inflation higher.
articles.content:
WASHINGTON – Americans are "really, really down" after two years of a pandemic and amid rising gasoline prices but the economy is in better shape than many think, President Joe Biden said Thursday.
